## Error rates for various multiplicity controls

```{r}
library(funnelplot)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
M <- 100
res1 <- replicate(M, {
  N <- 100
  xx <- generate_example(N,100,1000,0.4)
  ff <- funnel(y~1|id,control = pointTarget(limits = 0.05),data=xx)
  not_outlier <- sum(ff$results$inside95)/N
})
summary(res1)
```

```{r}
M <- 100
res2 <- replicate(M, {
  N <- 100
  xx <- generate_example(N,100,1000,0.4)
  ff <- funnel(y~1|id,control = pointTarget(limits = 0.05,standardised = TRUE),data=xx)
  not_outlier <- sum(ff$results$inside95)/N
})
summary(res2)
```

```{r}
M <- 100
res2 <- replicate(M, {
  N <- 100
  xx <- generate_example(N,100,1000,0.4)
  ff <- funnel(y~1|id,
    control = pointTarget(limits = 0.05,multAdj = "bonferroni"),
    data=xx)
  not_outlier <- sum(ff$results$inside95)/N
})
summary(res2)
```
